system.description:
A character who wears these gauntlets has a Strength score of 18. This grants all the usual bonuses, including:

  • Melee attacks: +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls, in melee.

  • Unarmed attacks: Deal [[/r 1d2+3]] damage.

Encumbrance: If using the optional rules for @UUID[Compendium.ose-advancedfantasytome.rules.JournalEntry.u9gtXY21VnjrwwkH.JournalEntryPage.nRk895vQvT8AuWZ5#option-2:-detailed-encumbrance]{detailed encumbrance}.

  • Extra weight: The characterâ€™s ability to carry weight is increased by 1,000 coins. (i.e. the character can carry 1,400 coins without becoming encumbered.)
